Straight Shot was thankful for Perceptor's imput.

"Thank you, Exactly what=
 I'm trying to get through ta him.  You can't save everyone all the time, T=
ucson, it's impossible. But look at all the good you've already achieved.  =
Perceptor is here with us now, and having a better life thanks to you and R=
odimus, Nightlight, and Windlord are back with us again, thanks to your eff=
orts.  And know something?  That's a pretty big accomplishment."

Tucson sm=
iles.

"I only - wish I could do more."

Quickstride pats Tucson on his sho=
ulder.

" Heey, you've done more than your share of good deeds already sir.=
 We can all attest to that.  You went out there and you showed Hydras a thi=
ng or two when you strategically got our comrades out of his clutches.  Wit=
hout your strategies we wouldn't have everyone back with us."

Straight Sho=
t nodds.

"Yeah, ya might not have defeated hydras in a one on one, but you=
 did show him a thing or two when you stepped up to the plate, and coordina=
ted the rescue efforts.  I don't think they saw that one comming."

Tucson'=
s grin grows.

" Hmm, then I - suppose as soon as I'm well enough, we - sho=
uld try and think ahead and - hopefully plan our precautionary measures aga=
inst - future attacks."

That made Straight Shot smile.  She was happy to s=
ee Tucson comming to his senses.

ave you, he
